name: QR Generator - QR & Barcode Creator - Generate QR
description: Generate - Qr code & Barcode  One of the best app which provides both scan & generate feature for Qr code & Barcode.   Generate - QR Barcode of all types (9 different Qr code type and 8 different Barcode types code generate feature available)  Easily and instantly save and share with others using available share options in your phone .   See all previously generated QR Barcode in History Page.   Supported Barcode Format :  -PDF417  -Code128  -Code39  -UPC-A  -ITF  -UPC-E -EAN-8  -EAN-13  Supported Qr Code type: -Product - Text  - Web-Url  - Phone  - Contact  - Geo  - Wifi  - Event - Message   - EAN-8 generator (European Article Number 8, EAN-8 Supplement 5/Five-digit Add-On, EAN-8 Supplement 2/Two-digit Add-On, EAN-8+5, EAN-8+2, EAN8, EAN8+5, EAN13+2, UPC-8, GTIN-8, GS1-8, EAN/UCC-8)  - Code 39 generator (ANSI/AIM Code 39, Uniform Symbology Specification Code 39, USS Code 39, USS 39, Code 3/9, Code 3 of 9, USD-3, LOGMARS, Alpha39, Code 39 Extended, Code 39 Full ASCII)  - Code 128 generator (ANSI/AIM 128, ANSI/AIM Code 128, USS Code 128, Uniform Symbology Specification Code 128, Code 128 Code Set A, Code 128 Code Set B, Code 128 Code Set C, Code 128A, Code 128B, Code 128C)  - PDF 417 generator (Portable Data File 417)  - ITF generator (ANSI/AIM ITF 25, ANSI/AIM I-2/5, Uniform Symbology Specification ITF, USS ITF 2/5, ITF, I-2/5, 2 of 5 Interleaved, 2/5 Interleaved)  - EAN-13 generator (European Article Number 13, EAN-13 Supplement 5/Five-digit Add-On, EAN-13 Supplement 2/Two-digit Add-On, EAN-13+5, EAN-13+2, EAN13, EAN13+5, EAN13+2, UPC-13, GTIN-13, GS1-13, EAN/UCC-13)  - UPC-A generator (Universal Product Code version A, UPC-A Supplement 5/Five-digit Add-On, UPC-A Supplement 2/Two-digit Add-On, UPC-A+5, UPC-A+2, UPC Code, UPC Symbol, GTIN-12, GS1-12, UCC-12)  Scan all type of QR Barcode with front and Back Camera.  (Try everything for Free!)
